meanings.definition: Relating to love or a close, loving relationship.
meanings.sent1: The couple had a romantic dinner by candlelight.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys watching romantic movies with happy endings.
meanings.sent3: The romantic gesture of writing love letters seemed old-fashioned to some.
meanings.sent4: His eyes held a romantic sparkle whenever he looked at her.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a romantic paradise with blooming flowers and chirping birds.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an idealized view of reality.
Expressing love or affection in a sentimental way.
